project.name: Orion Edge Gateway
project.scope: API gateway, rate limiting, auth integration

sections.title: Project Context & Objectives
sections.goal: Understand the high-level vision, business drivers, and success criteria for Orion Edge Gateway.
sample_questions: Can you outline the primary business problem Orion Edge Gateway is solving?
What are the key success metrics or SLOs for this project?
How does this project align with Novereon Systems' mission and values?

sections.title: Architecture & Integration
sections.goal: Explore the technical design, integration points with other systems, and adherence to internal policies.
sample_questions: What are the core components and their interactions within Orion Edge Gateway?
How does the gateway integrate with Aegis IAM for authentication?
In what way have you ensured compliance with POL-SEC-001 Least Privilege & JIT Access?

sections.title: Operational Readiness
sections.goal: Assess readiness for deployment, monitoring, and incident response.
sample_questions: What runbooks are in place for deployment and rollback?
How are you testing the p95 latency SLA-ORI-02 before go-live?
What’s the plan to limit BLAST_RADIUS during partial outages?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify dependencies on other portfolio projects and their potential impact.
sample_questions: Which other projects in the portfolio does Orion Edge Gateway rely on for functionality?
How do you coordinate changes with Nimbus Observability for telemetry?
What’s the contingency if Aegis IAM experiences degraded performance?

sections.title: Risk Management & Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Discuss known risks, tradeoffs made, and mitigation strategies supported by evidence.
sample_questions: What key tradeoffs were made between latency and security features?
Can you reference any RFCs or tickets that influenced these decisions?
Which risks are you actively monitoring post-deployment and how?
